As an AI language model, I do not have access to the personal life of Milner. However, Milner is known for using his position and influence to advocate for various social and political causes. It is possible that his activism may affect his professional life, especially if it leads to controversy that can negatively impact his reputation or business dealings.

On the other hand, Milner's social activism could also generate positive attention and higher regard for him as a socially conscious and responsible individual. It could also attract support and collaborations with other individuals or organizations that share his values and beliefs, which could translate into enhanced business opportunities. Overall, the impact of Milner's social activism on his personal and professional life would depend on many factors, such as the specific causes he supports, the public's perception of his activism, and how he balances his activism with other aspects of his life and work.
